# subtitleVariants

**Instance Property**

The array of subtitle variants for the button.

## Declaration

```swift
var subtitleVariants: [String] { get }
```

## Discussion

An array of subtitle variants for this button in an arrangement from most- to least-preferred. The system selects a subtitle from this array that best fits the available space. You provide the subtitle variants to [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPDashboardButton/init(titleVariants:subtitleVariants:image:handler:)] as localized, displayable content.

## Accessing the Button Configuration

- **titleVariants**: The array of title variants for the button.
- **image**: The image the button displays.
